thread.section_title: The Goring - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Service is one of a kind!
thread.title_full: Service is one of a kind! - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Florence T
title: Service is one of a kind!
text: WOW! The service at The Goring truly is one of a kind. You will not be disappointed. From the moment we arrived we were greeted by Dane on the door who knew are name already. (Wherever you go in the hotel, all staff seem to know your name, honestly don't know how they do it) our room was spotless and beautifully decorated. The bathrooms are gorgeous and elegant too. I really can't recommend this hotel enough, and will certainly be returning very soon.
